thread.title: Queen's burglar shot by cops in butt sues for $10m | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Queen's burglar shot by cops in butt sues for $10m | Daily Mail Online

author: Jordan Gass-Poore For Dailymail.Com
title: Queen's burglar shot by cops in butt sues for $10m | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Burglar suing for $10million after getting shot in the butt by Queens police claims he has 'nightmares of being killed by officers and fear of anyone in uniform' Cops responded to Hull Avenue and 68th Street after a woman reported seeing an intruder in her home via a remote surveillance camera Felix Perez, 38, of Crown Heights, was walking through her child's bedroom When confronted, the suspect struggled with officers over a gun and was struck by a bullet Perez is being held at Rikers Island on burglary and assault charges He claims he suffers from PTSD because of the incident Published: 23:05 GMT, 11 February 2017 | Updated: 11:54 GMT, 12 February 2017 140 shares
